meanings.definition: A surgical procedure in which tissue or organs are transferred from one individual to another of the same species.
meanings.sent1: The homotransplants saved the patient's life by replacing damaged organs.
meanings.sent2: Doctors performed homotransplants to help the sick person get better.
meanings.sent3: The homotransplants were like a gift of life from one body to another.
meanings.sent4: The homotransplants acted as natural healers, bringing new hope.
meanings.sent5: The concept of homotransplants revolutionized medical treatments.

meanings.definition: The act of transplanting tissue or organs from one individual to another of the same species.
meanings.sent1: After the homotransplants, the patient's body accepted the new organs.
meanings.sent2: The success of homotransplants brought hope to many patients in need.
meanings.sent3: The homotransplants were like a magical exchange between bodies.
meanings.sent4: The homotransplants symbolized the unity of life and healing.
meanings.sent5: The hospital specialized in performing homotransplants for various conditions.
